method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the MixedInk.

method.name: add
method.shortdesc: Creates a new mixed ink swatch.

parameters.name: inkList
parameters.shortdesc: The inks to mix. Note: Must contain at least two process inks and one spot ink. Can accept: Array of Inks or MixedInkGroup.

parameters.name: inkPercentages
parameters.shortdesc: The percent to use of each ink in the ink list. (Range: 0 to 100 for each ink)

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new MixedInk (Optional)

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the MixedInk with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the MixedInk with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the MixedInk with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the MixedInks within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The MixedInk, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: MixedInk, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The MixedInk, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: MixedInk, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first MixedInk in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last MixedInk in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle MixedInk in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the MixedInk with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the MixedInk that follows the desired MixedInk.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the MixedInk whose index follows the specified MixedInk in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The MixedInk whose index comes before the desired MixedInk.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any MixedInk in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every MixedInk in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the MixedInk.
Returns the MixedInk with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
